text: Iochroma brevistamineum is a species of plant in the family Solanaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Iochroma brevistamineum Dammer - not an Iochroma (ref. Shaw, J. M. H. (1998) A Review of Iochroma in Cultivation. New Plantsman 5(3): 154–192. ) ==Sources== * Montúfar, R. & Pitman, N. 2004. Iochroma brevistamineum. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. brevistamineum Category:Flora of Ecuador Category:Data deficient plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Iochroma brevistamineum
